query:
SELECT p.id, p.title, p.order, p.slug
FROM pages p
JOIN modules m ON p.moduleId = m.id
WHERE m.name LIKE '%Subtra%'
ORDER BY p.order;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3791tceNk2iYTis.4402e8216d86 --database T5Ee3HJGcPdFeU4iAe9r9p --execute SELECT p.id, p.title, p.order, p.slug
